pr_title: Bug fix, return object type for field which has implicit object datatype when describe the table

timeline.message: Bug fix, return object type for field which has implicit object datatype when describe the table

timeline.bodyText:
We should be checking TYPE_NAME to be object, instead of checking its not null.
Also can you test how this would impact JDBC driver.
timeline.author: abbashus

replies.bodyText: I'm thinking of adding IT with JDBC driver involved later because our JDBC driver is already added as test dependency in Gradle. However, the problem is we don't have nightly build so it's difficult to test with latest changes in JDBC driver. The comparison test has same issue: #339 (comment)
replies.author: dai-chen

replies.bodyText:
Done. Verify the each row.
For testing with JDBC driver, I agree with chen's idea to do integration test based on nightly build pipeline.
replies.author: penghuo
